text: yahoodiyon ne kaha, "eesaeeyon kee koee buniyaad nahin." aur eesaiyon ne kaha, "yahoodiyon kee koee buniyaad nahin." haalaanki ve kitaab ka paath karate hai. isee tarah kee baat unhonne bhee kahee hai jo gyaan se vanchit hai. to allaah qayaamat ke din unake beech us cheez ke vishay mein nirnay kar dega, jisake vishay mein ve vibhed kar rahe hai
